room_title: Escape room "The Pazzioli's" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: Epic Escape room is the best escape room in Long Island! We had such a fun and hilarious time...I would absolutely and highly recommend Epic Escape rooms in West Hempstead! The owners were amazing and everyone enjoyed themselves!

room_title: Escape room "The Pazzioli's" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: We had such an amazing time at Epic Escape Rooms LI!!!! We went for one room and loved it so much we did another one! Everyone was friendly and helpful. I highly recommend!!

room_title: Escape room "The Pazzioli's" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: My friend and I were looking for something fun to do while visiting NY and this was by far one of the most fun things we have done in a long time. The puzzles were fun, complex, and exciting, and it was a thrilling experience. My friend and I are only here for a week, but we will be returning to try one of the different escape rooms that they have to offer.
